History

Ridgeline Labs was started by two students in a tiny dorm room with a big dream - building virtual reality applications that have positive emotional and mental health impacts. We've been chasing our VR dreams since.

Awards

Ridgeline Labs was a winner in the Tufts Gordon Institute 2016 Ideas Competition for its submission of RoVR, a dog ownership simulation game for VR. As a result, Ridgeline Labs received a grant dedicated towards the completion of RoVR.
